1: <pb/><t>A 'a jun tiempoal cha, ata 'oj eyal 'ixtic: Mamin Jehová, tzcal yuj diosal 'aych on̈; wach'xam xcot wal yowl 'a c'ojl 'a quib'n̈ on̈, ax ticnec tox x'ec' jun cha, to wan a'n pax sniwnal qui c'ojl on̈.</t>
2: <t>Ach qui Diosal qui Colmal aji; tzach ca'ch yipc qui c'ojol, yuj cha, matz on̈ xiw on̈. A ticnec tzon̈ b'itn 'aych Mamin Jehová, yujto achn̈ej 'aych 'och quipc on̈, tzon̈ a coln paxi, 'oj e chioc.</t>
3: <t>A mach 'ay stacn̈ti'al, 'oj 'ajxoc yuc' a 'a tzaljc'ojlal, atn scolnb'il tz'ajx yuj Dios.</t>
4: <t>Yuj cha, ax eyaln 'ixtic: Calc yuj diosal 'a Jehová, calc wach' paxti 'a sb'i 'a scal eb' 'anma', yujto caw wach' tzon̈ yutjec, qui nac coti, to niwn yel'ch 'a quib'n̈ec.</t>
5: <t>B'itn coyc 'a 'a, yujto yel xo wal niwn yel'ch tas sb'o 'a qui calec, yowlal 'oj 'ojcaxc 'el yuj smasnil 'anma 'a yolyib'n̈q'uinl tic.</t>
6: <t>Ex 'aj Sión, 'el cab' eyaw yuj tzaljc'ojlal yujto a qui Diosal an̈ israel on̈c tic, atn jun Dios To Cojxni, caw 'ay smay, 'ayc' 'a qui calec, 'oj e chioc.</t>
